source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: The Business Coaching Masterclass
items.headline: Win more clients, maximise your worth, and lead your coaching business to success.
objectives_summary: How do become a master business coach
How to grow and develop your coaching business
How to develop your brand and find your niche

items.title: micro MBA
items.headline: An entire MBA in less than five hours.
objectives_summary: Learn to sell. Learn to build. If you can do both, you will be unstoppable.
An entire MBA Program in one course!
A complete business library is included in this course worth over $250!

items.title: Zero to Hero in ISO 14001:2015 Environment Management System
items.headline: Short & Brief explanation of each clauses with plenty of examples. Even fresher's can easily implement ISO 14001:2015.
objectives_summary: Implementation procedures of ISO 14001:2015 Environmental management system

items.title: Foundation Real Practice Exam

visible_instructors.title: Abayzeed Elsmani Ahmed Abdelgadir
visible_instructors.name: Abayzeed Elsmani Ahmed
visible_instructors.job_title: a creative and innovative leader, projects management expert

items.headline: إختبارات للحصول على شهادة إنشاء وتشغيل مكاتب إدارة المشاريع
objectives_summary: About these mock exams: A bank of 300 questions Containing helpful explanations for each question Fully compatible with the latest version of Portfolio, Programme and Project Offices 2013 Edition Developed by Projects  Management Expert  Eng. Abayzeed  Elsmani 300 Questions! This package contains 300 root questions, Therefore, when you take the exam multiple times, you will always see slightly different questions, and will be forced to pay attention to the details, which is very useful for your real exam .

items.title: Management of Maritime Shipping and Logistics.
items.headline: Commercial Shipping, shipbroking, chartering, ship financing and logistics management in the maritime industry.
objectives_summary: Extensive knowledge into how the maritime shipping and logistics industry works.
You will get to know how a maritime shipping and logistics company is organised and structured.
You will be informed about the different departments in a shipping company and their different responsibilities.

items.title: Pivotal Management
items.headline: Creativity - Knowledge Management - Risk Management - Crisis Management - Change Management
objectives_summary: What is Management?
Customer Relationship Management
Managerial Skills

items.title: Fire Safety Management Handbook-First Edition
items.headline: Applying Fire Safety and Prevention techniques in Hospitals. MasterClass student-friendly presentation & learning tools.
objectives_summary: This Fire Safety Management course is intended to provide frontline healthcare staff with knowledge in Fire Safety and Prevention.
The students will learn fire safety and prevention techniques in hospitals that are based on global best practice.
This course is ideal for Healthcare Staff, Project Managers, Construction Managers, Fire Safety Officers, Architects, Project Engineers and Administrators.

items.title: International Trade - Part 4: Supply Chain Finance

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course is for banking, business, and import/export professionals wanting to gain a deeper understanding of trade.
objectives_summary: Discover the financing problems in international trade.
Identify the different stages of the supply chain.
Explore the methods used in supply chain financing.

items.title: Strategy: Strategic Implementation and Execution.
items.headline: Implement Strategy with Confidence in any Environment; whether Managerial; Entrepreneurial; or Operational.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to "Implement Strategy" in Business; your Organisation; or your Entrepreneurial  Ventures.
You will learn how to Infuse Strategy throughout the Organisational system.
You will learn how to monitor and control the Strategy Implementation System.

items.title: Create A Customer Care Team Culture - Team Leader Skills 5

visible_instructors.title: Mark Timberlake
visible_instructors.name: Mark
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Online Training Courses For Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Stephen Mather
visible_instructors.name: Stephen
visible_instructors.job_title: MBPsS, BSc (Hons) Psych, MSc Organizational Psychology

items.headline: Culture Change For Team Leaders - Customer Care - Leadership Skills - Team Performance Management - Effective Teams
objectives_summary: Understand what a team culture is.
Learn what behavior you should expect to see in a customer care culture.
Learn how to influence your team to welcome customers.

items.title: Master Talent Management
items.headline: mapping talent skill set to enhance productivity and gaining better results, as well as retaining the best talents.
objectives_summary: Learn principles of talent management
Learn talent management process
Learn talent management opportunities and challenges

items.title: First 5 Steps to Comply to Personal Data Protection Laws

visible_instructors.title: Mark Barnabas Lee
visible_instructors.name: Mark Barnabas
visible_instructors.job_title: Data Protection and Risk Management Advisory

items.headline: Begin your privacy protection journey toward complying to PDPA, GDPR, CCPA, etc...
objectives_summary: Recognize the role and responsibilities of a data protection officer
Identify the contents of data inventory for the organization
Formulate data protection policies and practices

items.title: Design and Develop Effective Teams
items.headline: Lead your team to high performance with great structure, clear roles and responsibilities and a focus on learning
objectives_summary: Develop strategies to lead your team through the four stages of team development: forming, storming, norming and performance
Create a competency framework that can be used for development and performance management
Structure your team to ensure you have the right people in the right jobs, and you achieve the outcomes you need

items.title: Business Key Performance Indicators ( KPIs)
items.headline: How to effectively and efficiently develop and use key performance indicators for businesses
objectives_summary: Developing and using key performance indicators
The key performance indicators guide
Three ways key performance can build a better team

items.title: Leading Peers (or anyone else)
items.headline: Because ordering people to do something seldom works (long term).
objectives_summary: Lead peers (or anyone else) to adopt your ideas.
Identify what is causing a person to be a blocker.
Develop effective arguments that speak to the heart (gut) and mind.

items.title: CMA Exam1 in Depth Review-Variance Analysis& Flexible Budget
items.headline: Comprehensive coverage of IMA part #1 exam  Section C -Performance Management-Flexible Budget &Responsibility Accounting
objectives_summary: Know how to produce a flexible budget to develop a management report
How to prepare a performance analysis by comparing actual results to the master budget,
Be able to identify and explain the different types of responsibility centers
